question: For the last 4 months I have been experiencing my face turning red and hot in the evenings, I went to a doctor who just keeps putting me on antihistamines which I don't believe are working. Now I'm am getting lots of dry skin on my face, I'm starting to think my face flushing is worse if I consume sugar on the dayCould be an allergy? Diabetes? Confused
title: Facial flushing and dry skin
